(Could some Preds notice this battle? I mean come on we're outside Hell Bea=
st's base)

::Crosis::

    The sword sliced right through his abdomen, he =
was weakening. But he still had Ironhide on the ground, so he could still w=
in. He transformed to bot mode and raised his sword high.
    "I'm going to=
 finish what Megatron started," He said to the bot.
